dmca.title: Habbo Hotel Complains of Virtual Furniture Cloning
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
 
The site below, hosted by you, is infringing our copyright. I hereby
confirm that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the
copyright for http://www.habbohotel.co.uk
The owner of this copyright is
Sulake UK Ltd.
 
www.habbohotel.co.uk is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and cheques.
 
Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus:
 'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this
website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake UK Ltd. All
rights are reserved.'
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this
website is not authorized by Sulake UK Ltd, the copyright owner, or the
law.
 
I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that
I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this
under penalty of perjury.
 
I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from
your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected.
 
 http://www.habbofurniclone.blogspot.com/

Yours sincerely,
 


::[Private]

::Safety Officer, Sulake Corporation

::[private]@sulake.com
